item.title: Has Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. has declared a dividend of 4600% (₹11 per share) with an ex-date of October 15, 2025, and a dividend yield of 3.96%. Total returns have varied, with a positive 5-year return of 16.29%. Time: 25 minutes ago
